titles.title: Deficit Reduction Account Act of 1993
To establish a deficit reduction account and a Build America Account in the Treasury of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H2466)
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H5109)

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Deficit Reduction Account Act of 1993 - Establishes in the Treasury: (1) a Deficit Reduction Account and appropriates to the Account such sums determined by the Secretary of the Treasury to be equivalent to amounts specified by subsequent Acts of Congress; and (2) a Build America Account and appropriates to that Account the amount determined by the Secretary to be equal to the interest earned on obligations in the Deficit Reduction Account.
